entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain showers at times heavy this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
